subSubSection.paragraph: Appears to be a goneplacoid crab. The overall habitus, aspects of the shape and colouration of the claws and shape of the carapace all fit well with Mathildellidae , based on the author's (S.Ahyong) extensive examination of many species of this group. Fig. 24
